The three '''Stygian witches''' are mythological monsters in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]''. They appeared in Season 2 Episode 2 in Medusa's Cave.

== Behavior ==
The Stygian witches can allegedly predict the future and wear blindfolds to help them focus. They eat human flesh, and seek out and eat anyone nearby.

== Appearance ==
A Stygian witch has pale skin with warts, gray hair, missing teeth, a white blindfold, and a brown toga.

== Trivia ==
* The name Stygian is in relation to the [[wikipedia:Styx|River Styx]].
* The Stygian witches are called [[wikipedia:Graeae|Graeae]] in [[wikipedia:Greek Mythology|Greek Mythology]]. There are three of them with the names Deino (or Dino), Enyo, and Pemphredo (or Pephredo). These names are not given in the series.
* The Stygian witches in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]'' are based on the "Witch" minifigure in series 12 from Mattel which in turn was based on a texture for the [[witch]] in the [[Mash-up pack#Greek Mythology Edition|Greek Mythology Mash-up pack]].
